mapper.select:
insert into iw_sale_contract_order_operation_log (operateTime, operateAgentId, operateType, relationShipId, operateContent) values
(#{log.operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{log.operateAgentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{log.operateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{log.relationShipId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{log.operateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
